effects: Increase ATK by 20% when equipped with a Great Sword
Increase ATK by 20% when equipped with a Axe
name: Master Fencer

desc_short.0: Boost HP by 20%, nullify blind, and boost ATK when equipped with a large sword or axe
desc_short.5: Aumenta la VIT un 20%, anula ceguera y aumenta el ATQ al llevar espada larga o hacha
